sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含"识别力，判断"之意。
means: judgement ： 指经过训练或磨练或凭经历而得到辨别或判断事物的能力或品质。
discrimination ： 指辨别精微的能力，甚至平时观察不到的也可识别出来。
sense ： 指不带幻想或感情、偏见地观察事物，并能作出明智、公平的选择与决定。

sentence.Network_en: A tide of emotion rose and clouded his judgement.
sentence.Network_cn: 心头涌起一阵强烈的感情，模糊了他的判断力。

sentence.Network_en: Jake has raised two smashing kids and I trust his judgement.
sentence.Network_cn: 杰克养大了两个了不起的孩子，我相信他的判断。

sentence.Network_en: I respect his judgement and I'll follow any advice he gives me.
sentence.Network_cn: 我尊重他的判断能力，会接受他提出的任何建议。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 替身使者_百度百科 ... Death 13 死神13 Judgement 审判（judgement） High Priestess 女教皇.
有个J开头的单词_百度知道 ... judge n. 法官；裁判员 judgement n. 意见；审判；判断 juice n. (水果等)汁，液.
法律英语专业词汇汇总 ... 派出所 police station 判决 judgement;determination 判决书 judgement;determination;verdict.
人教版高中英语单词表(第三册上必修) - 豆丁网 ... weakness n. 软弱 judgement n. 裁判 desire vt. 要求；期望 n.欲望.

list.abs: 价值判断(value judgement)即关于价值的判断，是指某一特定的客体对特定的主体有无价值、有什么价值、有多大价值的判断。我国 …
pass 的中文意思_百度知道 ... pass by 忽略，不过问; 走过；(时间)逝去 pass judgement 下判决 pass off (感觉等)终止；中止.
法律英语专业词汇汇总 ... 休庭 adjourn the court;recess 宣判 pronounce judgement;determination 宣誓书 affidavit.
汉英法律专业词汇 -... ... conterfeited registered trademark 假冒注册商标 default judgement 缺席判决 discovery 取证.

jx.jx_en_mean: contrary to what one feels to be wise or sensible
jx.jx_cn_mean: 明知不可取地，明知不适当地

jx.jx_en_mean: (of a law court or judge) give a decision concerning a defendant or legal matter
delay the process of judging or giving one's opinion
jx.jx_cn_mean: 推迟作出评价，暂时不表态

jx.jx_en_mean: assume the right to judge someone, especially in a critical manner

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French jugement, from juger 'to judge'

means.word_mean: 1. the legal document stating the reasons for a judicial decision;

sentences.sentence: "opinions are usually written by a single judge"

means.word_mean: 2. an opinion formed by judging something;

sentences.sentence: "he was reluctant to make his judgment known"

means.word_mean: 3. the cognitive process of reaching a decision or drawing conclusions
5. the capacity to assess situations or circumstances shrewdly and to draw sound conclusions
6. (law) the determination by a court of competent jurisdiction on matters submitted to it
7. the act of judging or assessing a person or situation or event;

sentences.sentence: "they criticized my judgment of the contestants"

auth_sentence.content: I like this, but against my better judgement.
auth_sentence.res_content: I like this, but against my better judgement.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I like this, but against my better judgement.

auth_sentence.content: So bad a judgement and so waspish a temper.
auth_sentence.res_content: So bad a judgement and so waspish a temper.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So bad a judgement and so waspish a temper.

auth_sentence.content: It could also explain the occasional lapse of judgement.
auth_sentence.res_content: It could also explain the occasional lapse of judgement.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It could also explain the occasional lapse of judgement.

stems_affixes.word_buile: judge=judg判断,审理,法官→n.法官, 审判员
judge[n.法官, 审判员]+ment表名词→n.判断,看法
judg判断,审理,法官+ment表名词→n.判断,看法

stems_affixes.value_cn: 宣判, 判决, 把……判给, 认为
stems_affixes.word_buile: ad一再+judg判断,审理,法官+e→一再判断→裁决
pre预先+judg判断,审理,法官+e→v.预先判断

means.word_mean: 审判, 判决,裁决; 裁判

sentences.en: He passed judgement on the accused man.

means.word_mean: 判断, 判断力,识别力

sentences.en: I can't make that decision for you, you will have to use your judgement.
sentences.cn: 我不能代你作决定, 你得自己拿主意了。

means.word_mean: 看法, 意见, 评价

sentences.en: I felt completely unable to come to any judgement about it at all.
sentences.cn: 关于这件事我觉得无法提出任何看法。

jushi.english: He passed judgement on the accused man.
I can't make that decision for you; you will have to use your judgement.
jushi.chinese: 我不能代你作决定,你得自己拿主意了。

jushi.english: I felt completely unable to come to any judgement about it at all.
jushi.chinese: 关于这件事,我觉得无法提出任何看法。
